title: Mari-mann Herb Company
description: A large retail gift and health food store, tea room, greenhouse, production and warehouse facility. One of the largest herb gardens in the Midwest. Offers a propriety line of natural fragrances, in-house-made dips, seasoning, sauces, jellies, herbs and spices, pestos, house tea blends, a huge selection of natural supplements and organic foods. A large selection of fragrances and essential oils are sold by the pound to spas, massage therapists, aromatherapists, and soap makers. The tea room is run March-October on Fridays with seatings at 11am and 12:30pm - reservations preferred. Also private luncheons, teas, and herb farm tours are available.
